times new roman">80%</font></div>
</td>
<td align="right" valign="bottom" width="16%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px 
double">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
times new roman">20%</font></div>
</td>
<td align="right" valign="bottom" width="18%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px 
double">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
times new roman">80%</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">The Company and MRT shall be responsible for the cost of a 
feasibility study on a pro rata basis based on their respective amended 
ownership percentages of the Cieneguita project.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Marje Minerals will also assume approximately $490,000 in debt 
of the Company in consideration for receiving half of all monthly net cash flows
that the Company is entitled from operations on the first 15 meters, if any, 
until the sooner of December 31, 2012 or until Marje Minerals receives $490,000 
from these cash flows (note 7).</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: 
italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Encino Gordo</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">On December 8, 2005, the Company and Sunburst de Mexico entered
into a &#8220;New Agreement&#8221; with MRT to exercise their option under the 
sale and purchase of the mining concessions agreement, dated August 18, 2005, to
obtain two mining concessions in the Encino Gordo region. The New Agreement also
provided the Company the option to obtain three additional concessions in the 
Encino Gordo region.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">The following are additional material terms of the New 
Agreement:</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 72pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman">(a)&#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">The share option agreement with MRT was cancelled;</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 72pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman">(b)&#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">The Company granted MRT the option to buy all of the 
outstanding shares of Sunburst de Mexico for $100 if the Company failed to 
transfer $1,500,000 to Sunburst de Mexico by April 30, 2006. On April 6, 2006, 
MRT agreed to waive its option to purchase the shares of Sunburst de Mexico and 
also waived the Company&#8217;s obligation to transfer $1,500,000 to Sunburst de
Mexico. The property agreements were modified to change the NSR to a maximum of 
2.5% for all properties covered by the agreements. The property agreements 
contained NSRs ranging from 0.5% to 7%;</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 72pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman">(c)&#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">The Company agreed to issue 2,000,000 shares of the 
Company&#8217;s common stock to MRT within four months of the date of signing of
the New Agreement. These shares were issued to MRT and its assignee at the 
market value of $1.05 per share on February 23, 2006, and $2,100,000 was charged
to operations for the year ended February 28, 2006. This issuance fulfilled the 
Company&#8217;s payment obligations under the previous property 
agreements;</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 72pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman">(d)&#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">The Company agreed to issue 1,000,000 additional shares of the 
Company&#8217;s common stock to MRT if and when the Cieneguita property is put 
into production and reaches 85% of production capacity over a 90-day period, as 
defined in the New Agreement; and</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE:

</td>

cancelled.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>

<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">15</font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
&#160;<br>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">PAN AMERICAN GOLDFIELDS LTD.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(An Exploration Stage Company)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notes to the Consolidated Financial 
Statements</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Unaudited) (Expressed in U.S. 
Dollars)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Three Months Ended May 31, 2012 </font>
<hr style="COLOR: black" align="left" noshade size="2" width="100%">
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.<font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 
12pt"></font>MINERAL PROPERTIES (continued)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Sunburst de Mexico purchased two of the Encino Gordo 
concessions from MRT for a price of 1,000 pesos (approximately US$100), and MRT
assigned to Sunburst de Mexico a first right of refusal to acquire three 
additional Encino Gordo concessions. The total payments to acquire 100% of these
three additional concessions were as follows: $10,000 on June 30, 2006 (paid); 
$25,000 on December 31, 2006 (paid), $50,000 on December 31, 2007 ($20,000 of 
this payment was made on January 3, 2008 and the balance was paid on February 
29, 2008) and $75,000 on December 31, 2008 (the payment was not made and the 
Company was in default). In August 2009, the Company decided to surrender the 
Encino Gordo 2 mining concession eliminating any future concession payments on 
these properties.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In May 2012, the Company transferred its interest in 
concessions at the Encino Gordo project located in the Barranca region of 
Chihuahua State in Mexico, which included two concessions owned by the Company 
and two additional concessions the Company had the option to acquire, to 
MRT.&#160;&#160;In connection with the transfer, MRT paid $100,000 cash, waived 
$200,000 in payments the Company owed to MRT in connection with the Encino Gordo
Project and agreed to assume all of the Company&#8217;s obligations related to 
the transferred concessions.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: 
italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Cerro Delta</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In February 2011, the Company management entered into an 
agreement with Compania Minera Alto Rio Salado S.A., a private Argentine entity,
for the acquisition of the 15,000 hectare Cerro Delta project in northwest La 
Rioja Province, Argentina. Under the terms of the agreement, the Company must 
pay $150,000 upon signing (paid), and $200,000 on the first anniversary (the 
Company has paid $140,000 of the $200,000 amount due and is negotiating the 
terms for the balance of the payments), $500,000 on the second anniversary, 
$750,000 on the third anniversary, $1.2 million on the fourth anniversary, and 
$2.2 million on the fifth anniversary of the signing, with a final option 
payment of $5 million to purchase a 100% interest in the project payable on the 
sixth anniversary of the signing. The vendor will retain a 1% NSR (note 
17).</font></div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"

10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">PROMISSORY NOTES</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">As at May 31, 2012, the Company had $nil (February 29, 2012 - 
$nil) of promissory notes outstanding, comprising the following:</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 72pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman">(a)&#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">During the year ended February 29, 2008, the Company converted 
accounts payable of $465,994 (Swiss Franc (&#8220;CHF&#8221;) 565,000) into 
promissory notes. The Company had an implied obligation to pay the accounts 
payable in CHF as the funds to pay the expense came from Swiss investors in CHF.
Accordingly, the promissory notes were issued in CHF. The notes consisted of one
warrant for each CHF 5.00 of notes issued, exercisable at $1.00 each. The 
principal and interest on the notes became due and payable on April 30, 2008. 
The interest rate payable during the default period was 12%. In September 2011, 
the Company executed debt conversion and release agreements to convert 
promissory notes and related interest charges in the amount of $1,091,645 into 
Company&#8217;s common shares for a total of 3,340,880 shares (note 
10).</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>

</td>
<td>

align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">During the year ended February 29, 2012, the Company entered 
into an agreement to convert $17,778 of the promissory notes including accrued 
interest by issuing 55,000 shares of the Company&#8217;s common stock (note 
10).</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>

<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>

<div>

September 2011, the Company assigned these notes to Marje Minerals as part of

<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

Times New Roman">As at May 31, 2012, there were loans payable in the amount of 
$6,484 (February 29, 2012- $12,887), which are all current. The loans are 
repayable in monthly instalments of $3,272 (February 29, 2012 &#8211; $3,272), 
including interest of 7.50% per annum.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">The Company is authorized to issue 20,000,000 shares of 
preferred stock. The Company&#8217;s board of directors is authorized to divide 
the preferred stock into series, and with respect to each series, to determine 
the preferences and rights and qualifications, limitations or restrictions 
thereof, including the dividend rights, conversion rights, voting rights, 
redemption rights and terms, liquidation preferences, sinking fund provisions, 
and the number of shares constituting the series and the designations of such 
series. The board of directors could, without stockholder approval, issue 
preferred stock with voting and other rights that could adversely affect the 
voting rights of the holders of common stock, which issuance could have certain 
anti-takeover effects. There were no shares of preferred stock issued or 
outstanding at May 31, 2012 or February 29, 2012.</font></div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">17</font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
&#160;<br>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">PAN AMERICAN GOLDFIELDS LTD.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(An Exploration Stage Company)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notes to the Consolidated Financial 
Statements</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Unaudited) (Expressed in U.S. 
Dollars)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Three Months Ended May 31, 2012 </font>
<hr style="COLOR: black" align="left" noshade size="2" width="100%">
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman">10.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">COMMON STOCK</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In May 2012, the Company converted subscription proceeds of 
$45,000 and issued 300,000 shares of common stock in a private placement. The 
subscribers to the subscription proceeds have agreed to purchase one unit for 
each $0.20 of subscription proceeds. Each unit consists of one share of the 
Company&#8217;s common stock and two warrants each exercisable at $0.20 and 
$0.30, which expire in two years.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In April 2012, the Company issued 235,294 common shares 
pursuant to a debt settlement agreement to settle $40,000 of debt. The shares 
were valued at the time of issuance at $0.17 per share.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In April 2012, the Company issued 250,000 common shares to a 
consultant pursuant to a consulting agreement. The shares were valued at the 
time of issuance at $0.18 per share.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In February 2012, the Company issued 500,000 shares of common 
stock and warrants to purchase 500,000 shares of common stock at $0.30, expiring
on February 29, 2014, to a consultant.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Between September 2011 and February 2012, the Company converted
subscription proceeds of $900,000 and issued 4,500,000 shares of common stock in
a private placement. The subscribers to the subscription proceeds have agreed to
purchase one unit for each $0.20 of subscription proceeds. Each unit consists of
one share of the Company&#8217;s common stock and one warrant each exercisable 
at $0.30, which expires in two years.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In December 2011, the Company acquired 6% ownership interest in
the Cieneguita project in exchange for 3,333,333 common shares, of which, the 
Company had issued 1,166,667 common shares as of February 29, 2012.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In October 2011, the Company and note holders agreed to cancel 
$979,476 of outstanding debt in exchange for 3,340,880 shares of the 
Company&#8217;s common shares. The Company recognized a gain on settlement of 
debt in the amount of $277,891. In November 2011, the Company also issued 
267,271 shares to a consultant as consulting fee relating to the settlement of 
debt.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In August 2011, the Company negotiated return of 750,000 shares
to the treasury from a former president. The shares were valued at the time of 
issuance at $0.28 per share.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In July 2011, the Company issued 500,000 shares of common stock
and warrants to purchase 500,000 shares of common stock at $0.30, expiring on
July 21, 2013, to a consultant.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In June 2011, the Company converted subscription proceeds of 
$300,000 and issued 1,500,000 shares of common stock in a private placement. The
subscribers to the subscription proceeds have agreed to purchase one unit for 
each $0.20 of subscription proceeds. Each unit consists of one share of the 
Company&#8217;s common stock and one warrant each exercisable at $0.30, which 
expires in two years.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In June 2011, the Company issued 125,000 shares to a consultant
pursuant to a consulting agreement.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In June 2011, the Company issued the 423,752 shares pursuant to
the April 2011 debt settlement agreement. The shares were valued at the time of 
the debt settlement agreement of $0.28 per share.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In April 2011, the Company converted subscription proceeds of 
$347,000 and issued 1,735,000 shares of common stock in a private placement. The
subscribers to the subscription proceeds have agreed to purchase one unit for 
each $0.20 of subscription proceeds. Each unit consists of one share of the 
Company&#8217;s common stock and one warrant each exercisable at $0.30, which 
expires in two years.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In March 2011, the Company converted subscription proceeds of 
$665,000 and issued 3,325,000 shares of common stock in a private placement. The
subscribers to the subscription proceeds have agreed to purchase one unit for 
each $0.20 of subscription proceeds. Each unit consists of one share of the 
Company&#8217;s common stock and one warrant each exercisable at $0.30, which 
expires in two years.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In March 2011, the Company and a note holder agreed to cancel 
$17,778 in outstanding debt in exchange for 55,000 shares of the Company&#8217;s
common stock.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In March 2011, the Company issued 500,000 shares of common 
stock and warrants to purchase 500,000 shares of common stock at $0.30, expiring
on December 31, 2002, to a consultant.</font></div>

&#160;<br>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">PAN AMERICAN GOLDFIELDS LTD.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(An Exploration Stage Company)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notes to the Consolidated Financial

<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Unaudited) (Expressed in U.S. 
Dollars)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Three Months Ended May 31, 2012 </font>
<hr style="COLOR: black" align="left" noshade size="2" width="100%">
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman">11.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">STOCK COMPENSATION PROGRAM</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">On March 18, 2009, the board of directors approved the granting
of stock options according to the 2009 Nonqualified Stock Option Plan 
(&#8220;2009 Option Plan&#8221;) whereby the board is authorized to grant to 
employees and other related persons stock options to purchase an aggregate of up
to 6,000,000 shares of the Company's common stock. Subject to the adoption of 
the 2009 Option Plan, the options were granted and vest, pursuant to the terms 
of the 2009 Option Plan, in six equal instalments, with the first instalment 
vesting at the date of grant, and the balance vesting over 2.5 years, every six 
months.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In the three months ended May 31, 2012, the Company awarded nil
options to purchase common shares (May 31, 2011 &#8211; 1,600,000) and recorded 
stock-based compensation expense for the vesting options of $86,600 (May 31, 
2011- $146,175). The following weighted average assumptions were used for the 
Black-Scholes option-pricing model to value stock options granted in 2012 and 
2011:</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" width="37%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 1.5pt solid; BORDER-
BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; </font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="16%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 1.5pt solid; BORDER-
BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
times new roman">2013</font></div>
</td>
<td align="right" valign="middle" width="2%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 1.5pt 
solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; </font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="17%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 1.5pt solid; BORDER-

<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
times new roman">2012</font></div>
</td>
</tr><tr bgcolor="#cceeff">
<td valign="bottom" width="37%">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
times new roman">Expected volatility</font></div>
</td>
<td valign="top" width="16%">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
times new roman">-</font></div>
</td>
<td align="right" valign="middle" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; </font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="17%">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
times new roman">110.11%</font></div>
</td>
</tr><tr bgcolor="white">
<td valign="bottom" width="37%">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
times new roman">Weighted-average volatility</font></div>
</td>
<td valign="top" width="16%">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
times new roman">-</font></div>
</td>
<td align="right" valign="middle" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-

<td valign="bottom" width="17%">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

</td>
</tr><tr bgcolor="#cceeff">
<td valign="bottom" width="37%">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

</td>
<td valign="bottom" width="16%">

<td valign="bottom" width="37%">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

<td valign="top" width="16%">

FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; </font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="17%">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
times new roman">10</font></div>
</td>
</tr><tr bgcolor="#cceeff">
<td valign="bottom" width="37%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
times new roman">Risk-free rate</font></div>

<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">As of May 31, 2012, there was an estimated $291,000 of total 
unrecognized compensation cost related to non-vested share-based compensation 
arrangements granted under the 2009 nonqualified stock option plan. That cost is
expected to be recognized over a weighted-average period of approximately 1.30 
years.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">On April 29, 2011, the Company repriced the exercise price of 
1,125,000 vested stock options by reducing the exercise prices of $0.36 and 
$0.44 to $0.28. As a result, the Company recorded incremental stock-based 
compensation of $6,000 during the year ended February 29, 2012.</font></div>

&#160;<br>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">PAN AMERICAN GOLDFIELDS LTD.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(An Exploration Stage Company)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notes to the Consolidated Financial 
Statements</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Unaudited) (Expressed in U.S. 
Dollars)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Three Months Ended May 31, 2012 </font>
<hr style="COLOR: black" align="left" noshade size="2" width="100%">
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman">12.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">WARRANTS</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">As at May 31, 2012, the Company had a total of 32,709,567 
warrants (February 29, 2012 &#8211; 32,011,733) outstanding to purchase common 
stock. Each warrant entitles the holder to purchase one share of the 
Company&#8217;s common stock. The Company has reserved 32,709,567 shares of 
common stock in the event that these warrants are exercised.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">During the three months ended May 31, 2012, the Company 
received $nil from warrants exercised.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
</font></td>
<td valign="top" width="3%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
</font></td>

style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
</font></td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">21</font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
&#160;<br>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">PAN AMERICAN GOLDFIELDS LTD.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(An Exploration Stage Company)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notes to the Consolidated Financial 
Statements</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Unaudited) (Expressed in U.S. 
Dollars)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Three Months Ended May 31, 2012 </font>
<hr style="COLOR: black" align="left" noshade size="2" width="100%">
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman">13.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">RELATED PARTY TRANSACTIONS</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">For the three months ended May 31, 2012, the Company paid or 
accrued management and directors fees of $120,500 (May 31, 2011- $91,000) to 
certain officers and directors. The Company also paid or accrued $150,556 (May 
31, 2011 - $256,350) to certain officers and directors for exploration property,
finders&#8217; fee, travel, office and other related expenses.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">The Company also paid consulting fees of $nil (May 31, 2011 - 
$24,000) to a company owned by a director.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">As at May 31, 2012, accounts payable of $273,531 (May 31, 2011 
- $474,294) was owing to directors and officers of the Company and $nil (May 31,
2011 - $1,826) was owing to a company controlled by a director. In addition, 
promissory notes of $nil (May 31, 2011 - $11,130) were owed to a company 
controlled by a director.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">All related party transactions are in the normal course of 
business at the exchange amount agreed to by each party.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
